law.text: In any criminal or penal prosecution the defendant, on his own request, shall be allowed to testify in his own behalf, but his failure to do so shall not be commented upon or create any presumption against him.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 1, effective June 21, 1974. -- Recompiled as KRS 421.225, 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 62. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1645, 1646.
